body: Here's what I'm imagining. Kyle sticks his fingers in Stan's ass. Stirs it around. 'Ew. Wtf.' 'My bad, it was Taco Tuesdays, should have picked another day for this.' 'Oh wtf, there's blood in here.' 'Oops. Shouldn't have eaten so many.' And when they start fucking each other and their vision starts to blur from the rapid thrusts, Kyle sticks his poop stained fingers in Stan's mouth out of habit. Stan vomits upon realising its shit. The vomit flies up, spilling all over the intertwined bodies of Kyle and Stan, it's gross as fuck. The smell permeates the sweaty room, smelling like a virgin's nest. Kyle vomits. The vomit spews into the air, covering the bed in crusty solid. Some of the vomit goes into Stan's mouth. In shock, Stan accidentally swallows. His stomach starts to rumble. 'Oh no.' Stan shits out buckets worth of Tacos. Its fucking disgusting. Worst part? Kyle's mouth was positioned directly below Kyle's ass since he was eating him out a moment ago. It's a god damn catastrophe
Matt and Trey were definitely laughing their asses off reading this when researching how to yaoi-ify Tweek and Craig
